Why Choose Go Zanzibar?

We understand that arriving in a new country can be stressful. That's why we've dedicated ourselves to providing the smoothest transfer experience on the island.

Safe & Reliable

Licensed professional drivers and well-maintained vehicles for your safety.

Punctual Service

We track your flight to ensure we are there when you land. No waiting.

Best Price Guarantee

Fixed prices with no hidden fees or surge pricing. What you see is what you pay.

24/7 Support

Our customer support team is available via WhatsApp and phone around the clock.

Our Popular Services

From seamless airport pickups to exciting excursions around the island, we have everything you need for a perfect vacation.

From $15

Airport to Stone Town

Comfortable private transfer from Abeid Amani Karume International Airport to Stone Town hotels.

From $45

Airport to Nungwi / Kendwa

Direct transfer to the beautiful northern beaches of Nungwi and Kendwa. Approx 1.5 hours.

From $40

Airport to Paje / Jambiani

Travel to the kite-surfing paradise on the southeast coast. Approx 1 hour.

From $30

Stone Town City Tour

Explore the historic alleys, markets, and architecture of the UNESCO World Heritage site.

From $65

Safari Blue Experience

Full day sailing, snorkeling, and seafood lunch on a sandbank.

From $25

Spice Farm Tour

Discover why Zanzibar is called the Spice Island with a guided farm tour.
